ygData.subject: Re: Re: Info Needed on items Spoilers are Accepted and wanted
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You have quite a while before even attempting to get the Short Sword of the Ykesha.  It is found on a level 50ish ghoul lord down in lower guk, and he is
ygData.messageBody:
GooDFeLLa wrote:
>
> From: "GooDFeLLa" <goodfella@...>
>
> To All Bards Out There,
>
> Im in desperate need of some info here. I myself has a natural curiosity
> about new things. So my Bard character has an even greater on new and
> interesting items. With that in mind, I would appreciate any info on how to
> obtain the followin items. Electrum Bladed Wakazashi (Very disappointed
> that the Lute quest doesn't work, even tho I'm not nearly high nuff to try
> for it yet) Short Sword of the Ykesha (which mob and where drops this item?
> I heard its in Upper Guk?) Mithril Armor (Where and how I find any of these
> pieces) Adamantite Armor(Double for this info I like to know if its better
> than Mithril).
>
> Ps. I think I'm gonna just roll on stocks and Not get a Last name to be
> unique =)
>
> Thanks To all in Advance,
> Chancez Bard of the 22nd Chord on BristleBane.
> "Do Not Fear What You Can Not Understand"
>
> ´┐¢ You Wouldn't Change Me If You Could ´┐¢

> Free email with personality! Over 200 domains!
> http://www.MyOwnEmail.com

> ONElist: your connection to online communities.

You have quite a while before even attempting to get the Short Sword of
the Ykesha. It is found on a level 50ish ghoul lord down in lower guk,
and he is quite hard. Surrounded by 2 level 48 guards = one hell of a
fight. Mithril is found in solusek B, and you also have to be high
level to get that. Adamantite.. i just know of epolets which are good
for casters but not bards. I'd suggest you wait a bit before trying
this stuff =)

-- Eronan
